items.title: Lids & Sealing Options

options.label: PP Lid
options.desc: Suitable for hot food use-cases; designed to handle elevated temperatures.

options.label: PET Clear Lid
options.desc: Best for cold/room-temperature presentation where visibility matters.

options.label: Foil Sealing Lid
options.desc: For stronger sealing needs (requires sealing machine) and higher heat tolerance use-cases.

hero.title: Trading Services for GCC
hero.description: End-to-end support designed to reduce sourcing risk and improve landed cost for Gulf buyers.

process.title: Expert Sourcing & Trade Support
process.description: A structured, end-to-end approach to ensure your procurement from China is reliable, transparent, and cost-effective.

steps.title: Product Sourcing & Options
steps.intro: We source the right product options based on your target market, price point, and usage needs. You receive clear choices with spec alignment before moving forward.

steps.title: Supplier Screening & Reliability
steps.intro: We prioritize consistent suppliers and reduce risk by confirming capability, packaging standards, and fulfillment reliability.

steps.title: Quotation & Negotiation
steps.intro: We help you compare options fairly (specs + packing + lead time) so you can make procurement decisions that protect your margin.

steps.title: Quality Checkpoints
steps.intro: Many problems happen because of small spec misunderstandings. We focus on rigorous checks before and during preparation.

steps.title: Consolidation Planning
steps.intro: If your order contains multiple items, we support consolidation planning to reduce shipping complexity and help lower total landed cost.

steps.title: Export & Shipping
steps.intro: We support trade requirements and coordinate shipment readiness with clear packing details and export documentation steps.

roi.title: The Real Value of a Trading Partner
roi.description: Aytima exists to protect your time and capital through a more professional bridge from China to the Gulf.

items.title: Fewer Errors, Fewer Delays
items.description: Rigorous checkpoints reduce mistakes that lead to costly project delays.

items.title: Better Predictability
items.description: Clear communication and planning for a smoother sales cycle.

items.title: Reduced Operational Load
items.description: We handle the ground-level details so your team can focus on growth.

items.title: Cleaner Communication
items.description: Transparent bridge from China production to Gulf procurement.

hero.title: Focused on the Gulf Market
hero.description: We work with buyers who need reliable supply for the GCC.

region.description: Aytima supports trade buyers across the most dynamic Gulf markets, ensuring every shipment meets local regulatory and quality standards.

standards.quote: "We deliver more than products; we deliver peace of mind for buyers who cannot afford a supply chain failure."

points.title: Fast Response & Clear Structure

points.title: Stable Quality & Packing
points.desc: Consistency is our signature. Every batch matches your sample, every pallet is export-ready.

points.title: Market-Aligned Inventory
points.desc: We source products specifically designed for Gulf distribution channels and consumer habits.

points.title: Export-Ready Coordination
points.desc: Detailed shipment steps and documentation management for smooth customs clearance.
